title: On the Phone
alt: 'No idea what I was thinking! Haha! But anyway, maybe we should check out what this Ba'al guy has to say.'
transcript:
Megan: Why is there a teapot in the bathroom?
Off-panel voice (right): Sorry. When I'm on the phone I always zone out and pick stuff up and carry it around.Megan: There's a hammer in the fridge.
Off-panel voice: Another phone call. I was just fidgeting.Megan: Did you put all our stuff in weird stacks?
Off-panel voice: Long call. Sorry.Megan: ...Why is there a giant obelisk in the backyard?
Off-panel voice: Phone again. My bad.
Megan: It's carved with prayers to "Ba'al, the Soul-Eater."
Off-panel voice: Haha! I'm so absentminded.
